blocks.name: isumshft
blocks.content: Index shift of an infinite sum. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(c5, caddc, cv(s1))), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3g(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c2, c3), csu(hs0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), csu(hs1, c2, cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), w0)
  3eqtr4d(csu(hs0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), csu(hs1, c2, cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), cfv(cli, cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cfv(cli, cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), w0)
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cli, cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cfv(cli, cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cio(hs2, wbr(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cli, cv(hs2))), cio(hs2, wbr(cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cli, cv(hs2))), w0)
  iotabidv(hs2, w0, wbr(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cli, cv(hs2)), wbr(cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cli, cv(hs2)))
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cli, cv(hs2)), wbr(cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cli, cv(hs2)), wbr(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5)), cli, cv(hs2)))
  breq1d(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cli, cv(hs2), cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5)), w0)
  seqfeq(hs0, co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5), w0)
  sylan2br(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5)))
  3eqtrrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5))), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  shftval(c5, cv(hs0), cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1))))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), c2))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1)))))
  syl6eleqr(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), c2, cfv(cuz, c4), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c5, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c4, cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c5, cz))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5)), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eluzsub(c4, c5, cv(hs0))
  rspccva(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1))), cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5))), wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  fveq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1)), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), c5, caddc)
  fveq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(c5, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  eleq2s(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cuz, co(c4, caddc, c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  eluzelcn(cv(hs0), co(c4, caddc, c5))
  pncan3(c5, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cli, cv(hs2)), wbr(cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, co(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cshi, c5)), cli, cv(hs2))), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c5, cz))
  isershft(c4, c5, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs2))
  mptex(s1, c2, c3)
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c4)
  df-fv(hs2, cli, cseq(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  df-fv(hs2, cli, cseq(c4, caddc, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))
  isum(hs0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), co(c4, caddc, c5), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  zaddcld(c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cc, w0)
  isum(hs1, c2, cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), c4, cmpt(s1, c2, c3), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cc, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  mpan9(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c2, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(s1)))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(s1))), cfv(cid, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), cfv(cid, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  fvmpt2i(s1, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, c3), c3)

  fvmpti(s0, co(c5, caddc, cv(s1)), c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c3, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  rspc(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c5, caddc, cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: isumsplit
blocks.content: Split off the first ` N ` terms of an infinite sum. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, csu(s0, c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  isumclim(s0, c0, c1, co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, csu(s0, c4, c1)), c2, c5, w0)
  climaddc2(hs0, cseq(c2, caddc, c5), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1), csu(s0, c4, c1), c4, c3, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cdm(cli), w0)
  isumclim2(s0, c3, c5, c4, c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cdm(cli)))
  iserex(s0, c2, c5, c3, c0, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1, w0)
  fzfid(c2, co(c3, cmin, nat1), w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c5, c4, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c4, c0, w0)
  mpjaod(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)))), wceq(c3, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)))))
  eqtr2d(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0))), co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  oveq1d(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl6eq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1), nat0, csu(s0, emptycls, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1), csu(s0, emptycls, c1)))
  sumeq1d(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c1, emptycls, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), emptycls), wbr(co(c2, cmin, nat1), clt, c2))
  ltm1d(c2, w0)
  zred(c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c2, cmin, nat1), clt, c2), wceq(co(c2, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), emptycls)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cz))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  peano2zm(c2)
  fzn(c2, co(c2, cmin, nat1))
  sum0(s0, c1)
  addid2d(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c4, c0, w0)
  3sstr4g(c4, c0, cfv(cuz, c3), cfv(cuz, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(cuz, c3), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  uzss(c3, c2)

blocks.name: isum1p
blocks.content: The infinite sum of a converging infinite series equals the first term plus the infinite sum of the rest of it. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)

thm isum1p(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(cfv(c2, c3), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c1))))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c2), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(cfv(c2, c3), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c1)), co(csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, co(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c1)), w0)
  isumsplit(s0, c0, c1, c3, co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))
  syl6eleqr(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c0, cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  peano2uz(c3, c3)
  oveq1d(csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, co(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c1), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c1), cfv(c2, c3), w0)
  3eqtr2d(csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, co(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c1), cfv(c2, c3), csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, c3), c1), csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, c3), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), w0)

  zcnd(c3, w0)
  ax-1cn()
  pncan(c3, nat1)
  sumeq2dv(s0, co(c3, cfz, c3), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c0, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, c3)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c3, c3)

  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cc))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cc, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl6eleqr(c3, c0, cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c3, cz))
  uzid(c3)

thm isum1p(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=((c2 ` c3)[+]sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c1)))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c2 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ((c2 ` c3)[+]sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c1)), (sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]((c3[+]1)[-]1)), c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c1)), w0)
  isumsplit(s0, c0, c1, c3, (c3[+]1), (ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c2, w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  syl6eleqr((c3[+]1), c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, (c3[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  peano2uz(c3, c3)
  oveq1d(sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]((c3[+]1)[-]1)), c1), caddc, sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c1), (c2 ` c3), w0)
  3eqtr2d(sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]((c3[+]1)[-]1)), c1), (c2 ` c3), sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]c3), c1), sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]c3),(c2 ` s0)), w0)
  sumeq1d(s0, (c3[...]((c3[+]1)[-]1)), c1, (c3[...]c3), w0)
  oveq2d(c3, cfz, ((c3[+]1)[-]1), c3, w0)
  sylancl(w0, ((c3[+]1)[-]1)= c3, c3 ∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c3, w0)
  ax-1cn()
  pncan(c3, nat1)
  sumeq2dv(s0, (c3[...]c3), (c2 ` s0), c1, w0)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c3[...]c3), (c2 ` s0)= c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]c3))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]c3),(c2 ` s0))=(c2 ` c3), c3 ∈ ℤ, (c2 ` c3)∈ ℂ)
  rspcdva(s0, c3, c0, w0, (c2 ` c3)∈ ℂ, (c2 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d((c2 ` s0), cc, (c2 ` c3), s0 = c3)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, (c2 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd((c2 ` s0), cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl6eleqr(c3, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c3 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c3)
  fsum1(s0, c3, (c2 ` c3), (c2 ` s0))
  fveq2(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, (c3[+]1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cfz, ((c3[+]1)[-]1))
  diff.co.s(s0, (c3[+]1), cmin, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cfz, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c2 ` c3), cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cn0, c0), co(c1, caddc, csu(s0, cn, c0))))

  eqtrd(csu(s0, cn0, c0), co(c1, caddc, csu(s0, cn, c0)), co(cfv(c2, nat0), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), c0)), w0)
  isum1p(s0, cn0, c0, c2, nat0, w0)
  nn0uz()
  0zd(w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, nat0), caddc, csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), c0), c1, csu(s0, cn, c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s0, nat0, cn0, w0, wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(c2, nat0), c1, wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), nat0, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, cn0, w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cfv(cuz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), c0), csu(s0, cn, c0)))
  sumeq1i(s0, cfv(cuz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), c0, cn)

blocks.name: climcnds
blocks.content: The Cauchy condensation test. If ` a ( k ) ` is a decreasing sequence of nonnegative terms, then ` sum_ k e. NN a ( k ) ` converges iff ` sum_ n e. NN0 2 ^ n x. a ( 2 ^ n ) ` converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Jul-2022.)
